sentences.sContent: Once there is a failed test then it requires sapience on the part of the tester to understand what really happened.
sentences.sContent_eng: Once there is a failed test then it requires sapience on the part of the tester to understand what really happened.
sentences.sCn: 一旦测试失败了，就需要测试人员的智慧来弄明白到底发生了什么。

words.tran: 聪明的；伶俐的；装聪明样的；有见识的
智慧的；明智的；赋予智慧的
